main.name: Janice Tsai
main.description: Interested in backend, cloud computing, network, and security
main.bio: Aside from coding and learning new ways of solving problems, I really enjoy hiking, music, and beautiful sunsets.

education.description: Second year. Involved with Frontend and Backend Development Teams for Creative Labs, Bruin Hyperloop, Association of Computing Machinery, and Bruin Home Solutions. Co-Music Director of Road to Damascus Acapella. Affiliated with Asian American Christian Fellowship.
Learned programming, 3D modeling/design, machining, art, physics through hands-on projects. Attended Bay Area Maker Faire 2019 to showcase senior capstone project to thousands of people.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Automated manual process of populating a dashboard. Improved and added new features to an email builder and managing tool. Building an application that monitors the health of networks and servers.

work.company: Bruin Home Solutions | The Data Grid
work.title: Backend Software Developer
work.description: Building a software distribution including a data collection app and web application that serves as centralized data management, macro data analysis, outreach/recruitment, public education tool, and a program development tool for all audit types.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Executed on front and back-end development of the Bild platform, including onboarding manufacturers and user dashboards. Developed and maintained a platform that helps small-medium sized businesses find manufacturers for their tangible products and manage their supply chain needs. Implemented customer-driven chat interface on landing page.

work.company: Assocation of Computing Machinery | Teach LA
work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Developing an interactive module for students to learn tech related topics, including how the internet works.

projects.title: The Data Grid
projects.category: A software distribution for communities to share data and resources with our platform

projects.title: Delivery System
projects.category: An optimized delivery system built in C++. Uses OpenStreetMap data. Check out the repo here!

projects.title: Kontagion
projects.category: An arcade based shooting game. Check out the repo here!

projects.title: Smart Coffee Machine
projects.category: Hands free coffee machine controlled via bluetooth

testimonials.text: Janice is one of the most curious people I've ever met. She's driven by her desire to learn more.
I have really enjoyed working with Janice. She is one of the most hardworking young women I know.
